docs.lead_paragraph: Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke on Friday promised a comprehensive review of the federal coal leasing program, even as President Donald Trump moves to do away with a moratorium on coal leases on public lands.

headline.print_headline: Interior Sec. Zinke Promises Review of Coal Leasing Program
headline.main: Interior Sec. Zinke Promises Review of Coal Leasing Program

docs.snippet: Interior Secretary Ryan Zinke on Friday promised a comprehensive review of the federal coal leasing program, even as President Donald Trump moves to do away with a moratorium on coal leases on public lands....

docs.lead_paragraph: Actual delays in delivering medical care to military veterans remain far worse at Veterans Affairs facilities in North Carolina and Virginia than internal records showed, according to a new report by government inspectors.

headline.main: Report: VA Not Tracking True Health Care Delays in 2 States

docs.lead_paragraph: The famous investor sees promise in the isolated country but claims he was surprised to find that a firm doing business there listed him as a shareholder.

docs.lead_paragraph: England captain Eoin Morgan blazed a fluent 107 to help secure a 45-run victory over West Indies in the first one-day international at a windy Sir Vivian Richards Stadium on Friday.

docs.lead_paragraph: Johnson & Johnson said on Friday that a state court jury in Missouri had returned a verdict in its favor in the latest trial to arise out of thousands of lawsuits alleging the company's talc-based products can increase the risk of ovarian cancer.
